name: Crazy Colosseum
description:
You have been captured by an alien race! They are making you fight for their amusement in a colosseum, but something is wrong with your ship! Your engine has cut out so you have to use your weapons recoil to move yourself around the arena! 

There are 5 waves, each with increasing difficulty, once you reach wave 5 you enter endless mode where the game gets gradually more difficult and your only goal is to get as many points as possible. Your points and current progress are displayed at the top of the screen, along with your bomb count and lives.

Different weapons have different damage, reload time, range, and recoil. Before you enter the colosseum pick one weapon from each category that you think will work best! Use the number keys 
1 2 and 3 to switch between weapons, use your mouse to aim and M1 to fire, and use the space bar to activate a bomb!

Will you be able to survive the increasingly chaotic arena with an out of control ship? 

Post your high score in the comments and good luck!
